issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: "mvn package -Pdist -DskipTests" fails with JDK8, caused by incorrect or illegal tags in doc comments.
fields.summary: [JDK8] Fix javadoc errors caused by incorrect or illegal tags in hadoop-tools

comments.body:
{color:red}-1 overall{color}.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12705013/HADOOP-11720-001.patch
  against trunk revision bb243ce.

    {color:green}+1 @author{color}.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    {color:green}+0 tests included{color}.  The patch appears to be a documentation patch that doesn't require tests.

    {color:green}+1 javac{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    {color:green}+1 javadoc{color}.  There were no new javadoc warning messages.

    {color:green}+1 eclipse:eclipse{color}.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    {color:red}-1 findbugs{color}.  The patch appears to introduce 4 new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

    {color:green}+1 release audit{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    {color:green}+1 core tests{color}.  The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-tools/hadoop-ant hadoop-tools/hadoop-aws hadoop-tools/hadoop-azure hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp hadoop-tools/hadoop-streaming.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5956//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5956//artifact/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-ant.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5956//console

This message is automatically generated.
+1, warnings by findbugs is not related to the patch since it's just includes fixes about javadoc. Committing this shortly.
Committed this to trunk, branch-2, branch-2.7. Thanks Akira for your contribution.

FAILURE: Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #7343 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/7343/])
HADOOP-11720. [JDK8] Fix javadoc errors caused by incorrect or illegal tags in hadoop-tools. Contributed by Akira AJISAKA. (ozawa: rev ef9946cd52d54200c658987c1dbc3e6fce133f77)
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/util/DistCpUtils.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-aws/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/s3native/NativeS3FileSystem.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-streaming/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/record/Buffer.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-azure/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/azure/NativeAzureFileSystem.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-streaming/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/record/Utils.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/SimpleCopyListing.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/CopyListingFileStatus.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-azure/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/azure/AzureNativeFileSystemStore.java
* hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/CHANGES.txt
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-aws/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/s3/S3FileSystem.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-aws/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/s3a/S3AFastOutputStream.java
* hadoop-tools/hadoop-ant/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ant/DfsTask.java
